title: What are some of Batman’s most underrated gadgets? - Quora

response.answer_text: Batman’s shark repellent. Yes, Batman hardly uses this gadget and it doesn’t exist in some continuities, but it’s not useless to him. So how exactly is shark repellant useful to Batman? Despite living in a freaking city, Batman seems to meet a lot of sharks.  And there’s even a villain called freaking King Shark.  And Batman did kind of use shark repellent on him and it worked.  See, Shark repellents aren’t useless. You never know if you might find a ten foot tall mutated shark trying to kill you in the DC universe. -Nailuj

Definitely his cowl. Other than looking cool, it is a multi-functional mask that helps Batman operate in his crusade. It’s eyes are built in with different types of vision used for different environments. He has built in night vision, infra-red and eagle eye vision.The cowl is made with a material made to be lightweight and easy to maneuver in while also being durable enough to take fucking hammer to the face with.It has built in audio communications to help communicate to different personal and to the Batcave.It has hearing ehancancements to help Batman being aware of the sounds of his environment not to rely just on his vision.It is black to help Batman stay secluded and undetectable during his investigations at night.
